gui.mineminenomi.config.category.keepsta: Please note that these settings only work if the "Keep stats after Death" option is set to CUSTOM!
gui.mineminenomi.config.option.ability_b:
Displays the cooldown, charge up time and any other number displayed in the ability icon as seconds instead of ticks
Default: false
gui.mineminenomi.config.option.ability_f:
Runs a check for all abilities on a player to remove dupes or suspicious abilities when the player joins the world
Default: true
gui.mineminenomi.config.option.ability_g:
Allows abilities to break or replace blocks; if turned OFF it will make some abilities completly useless
Default: true
gui.mineminenomi.config.option.always_re:
Gives item rewards (when available) after each win
Useless if the Retake Challenges is disabled
Default: false

Gives doriki, bounty and belly rewards after each win
Useless if the Retake Challenges is disabled

Responsible for how player unlock Haoshoku Haki;
